block.p: Podcast: Scheduled to appear this week are Caroline Weber on ''Nancy Cunard'' (that's Cunard above, photographed by Cecil Beaton, in 1954); David Leonhardt on ''Radicals for Capitalism''; Jeremy McCarter on Thornton Wilder; and Dwight Garner, senior editor, with best-seller news. Sam Tanenhaus, the editor of the Book Review, is the host.
First Chapters: Excerpts from ''Once Upon a Country,'' by Sari Nusseibeh; ''Ghosts of Spain,'' by Giles Tremlett; and other books.
